what_is:
Frum Philly is a place for the Philadelphia and south jersey jewish communities to come together. A place to get to know whats happening in your community. A place people can connect and find out about events, jobs, sales, and more.

Frum Philly is here to help you find out more about your community. Find out about and contribute to a growing community of PA Jewish neighborhoods and all that happens here.

content_boxes.title: Events
content_boxes.content: See whats happening around you. Frum Philly will have all the latest and greatest events occurring in your neighborhood.

content_boxes.title: Jobs
content_boxes.content: Looking for a job? Looking to hire? Frum Philly will offer a localized jobs board. Find work and workers near you.

content_boxes.title: Sales
content_boxes.content: Your digital neighborhood garage sale. See whats available in your neighborhood and sell things to your neighbors.

content_boxes.title: Real Estate
content_boxes.content: From a room to a house, find the right place to live with constantly updated real estate listings.

content_boxes.title: Business Listings
content_boxes.content: See what businesses and services are available locally. Have a business? Let people know about you.

content_boxes.title: Your Suggestions
content_boxes.content: Have an idea for a section? Frum Philly is open to hearing them. You will be able to contact us with your suggestions.
